item.title: [PI] Clickingbuttons.class HELP ++
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

Anyone can help me with this case?
it was working one day, then the next day it would randomly stop sending me the requests:

if(c.playerRights >= 0) { c.sendMessage("You have requested staff assistance."); for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[j].playerRights > 0) { Client staff = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; staff.sendMessage(c.playerName + " is requesting assistance!"); } else { return; } } } } break;

Read full topic
